variables.description: How the device is exposed to the instance (e.g., /dev/sdh, or xvdh).
variables.name: Device

variables.description: The ID of the instance to which the volume attaches. This value can be a reference to an                   AWS::EC2::Instance resource, or it can be                   the physical ID of an existing EC2 instance.
variables.name: InstanceId

variables.description: The ID of the Amazon EBS volume. The volume and instance must be within the same                   Availability Zone. This value can be a reference to an AWS::EC2::Volume resource, or it can be the                   volume ID of an existing Amazon EBS volume.
variables.name: VolumeId
